%title /ab/rule-types 列出所有的分配规则

=/ab/rule-types =
%toc

==功能 ==
返回分配规则`RuleTypes`列表

==URL==
/ab/rule-types

==HTTP请求方式==
GET

==请求参数==
无

==返回格式==
JSON XML

==参数==
{{{ class="brush:bash"
curl -HAcccept:application/xml https://baseurl/rule-types
curl -HAcccept:application/json https://baseurl/rule-types
  }}}

==返回结果==

===XML Reslut===
{{{ class="brush:xml"
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<rule-types>
    <ruleType>
        <url>http://localhost:8080/ab-service/rule-types/1</url>
        <code>PERCENT</code>
        <description>group the user by percent.</description>
    </ruleType>
    <ruleType>
        <url>http://localhost:8080/ab-service/rule-types/2</url>
        <code>PERCENT2</code>
        <description>group the user by percent.type2</description>
    </ruleType>
</rule-types>
  }}}
  
===Json Reslut===

{{{ class="brush:js"

[
        {
            "url": "http://localhost:8080/ab-service/rule-types/1",
            "code": "PERCENT",
            "description": "group the user by percent."
        },
        {
            "url": "http://localhost:8080/ab-service/rule-types/2",
            "code": "PERCENT2",
            "description": "group the user by percent. type2"
        }
]
  }}}
